circumstances: The aircraft suffered a right landing gear leg breakage due to a fracture in the area where the fork assembly separated during landing roll. The pilot, sole on board, was uninjured.
probable_cause:
Occurrence #1: main gear collapsed
Phase of operation: landing - roll
Findings
1. (c) landing gear, main gear - assembly
2. Landing gear, main gear - fatigue
3. (c) landing gear, main gear - previous damage
